description: Currently working in the Data Modelling team
Extensive use of Google BigQuery and Apache Airflow to automate the ETL process
Created and maintain the central data warehouse used by hundreds of analysts each month as the single source of truth
Working extensively on optimisation of queries while ensuring data quality throughout
Daily use of Git, Jenkins, Jira, Slack and Google Workspace among other technologies
Working on the integration of key KPIs during the merger between Just Eat and Takeaway, specifically focussing on GMV and customers
Collected, manipulated and stored data through the use of Python and MySQL
Improved the speed and efficiency of these processes by using AWS Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), AWS Lambda, and AWS Relational Database Service (RDS)
Used Git to share code with the technical team, Jira for development tracking, and Slack for communication
Reported to the Group MD, CTO and the Head of Business Analysis
Developed data extraction scripts through SQL
Improved reporting procedures, reducing time taken by up to 500%
Created scalable scripts that enhanced the data extraction process, simplifying the reporting procedure
Undertook A/B tests to enhance the experience of members whilst optimising the workflow based on user behaviour
Worked closely with the commercial team to develop reports, ensuring that the client was well served, including Ad Hoc data requests
Communicated with the technical team to ensure the table structure, availability, and integrity was maintained and accessible
Graduated with First Class Honours
Completed a technically based dissertation achieving 78% using Python, SQL and AWS products
Organised multiple events in the role with large numbers attending
Was involved in recruiting new students to the club which saw 33% growth over the previous committee
Demonstrated leadership, communication and organisational skills along with the ability to build relationships with people
For five years helped at a local Beaver group in the role of Colony Assistant
Thoroughly enjoyed supervising and leading activities for 6 â€“ 8-year-old children
Developed teamwork and communication skills with both adults and young children
Advanced knowledge of SQL including window functions, complex joins and CTEs. Intermediate skills in Python and progressing with JavaScript
Highly proficient in all areas of Microsoft Office, including Excel, Word and PowerPoint
Completed both the Duke of Edinburgh Gold and Bronze Awards
One of 27 Scouts who represented Somerset at the World Scout Jamboree in Japan
Ten Tors 35, 45 and 55-mile challenges completing them as team navigator
